          <title>
            <string language="ca">How to read and write a narrative</string>
            <string language="en">How to read and write a narrative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man eine Darstellung liest und schreibt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment lire et écrire un récit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como ler e escrever uma narrativa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come leggere e scrivere una descrizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να διαβάσει και να γράψει ένα αφήγημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Aquesta unitat conté activitats que serveixen de guia a l'alumne/a que vol aprendre, de manera pràctica i reflexiva, de llegir i escriure un text narratiu.</string>
            <string language="en">Unit with activities to help pupils who, in a practical and reflective way, want to read and write narrative text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßeinheit mit den Aktivitäten, zum der 
Schüler zu helfen, die, in einer praktischen und reflektierenden 
Methode, erzählenden Text lesen und schreiben möchten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité avec des activités pour aider les 
élèves qui, d'une voie pratique et r3fléchissante, veulent lire et 
écrire le texte narratif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade com as atividades para ajudar aos alunos 
que, em uma maneira prática e reflexiva, querem ler e escrever o 
texto narrativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità con le attività per aiutare gli allievi 
che, in un modo pratico e riflettente, desiderano leggere e scrivere 
il testo narrativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα με τις δραστηριότητες για να βοηθήσει τους 
μαθητές που, με έναν πρακτικό και αντανακλαστικό τρόπο, θέλουν 
να διαβάσουν και να γράψουν το αφηγηματικό κείμενο.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
